languages.text: {n}Приосанившись, Махарий горделиво произносит:{/n} "Род Зауэрбэков — один из первых аристократических домов, прибывших в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простор Коронус{/g}. На протяжении тысячелетий мы верно служили {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотому Трону{/g} и хранили веру. Воины Зауэрбэков проливали кровь на сотне войн и в разные годы правили множеством колоний династии фон Валанциус".

traits.locale_text: {n}Приосанившись, Махарий горделиво произносит:{/n} "Род Зауэрбеков — один из первых аристократических домов, прибывших в Простор Коронус. На протяжении тысячелетий мы верно служили Золотому Трону и хранили веру. Воины Зауэрбеков проливали кровь на сотне войн и в разные годы правили множеством колоний династии фон Валанциус".

languages.text: {n}Macharius puffs out his chest and says proudly,{/n} "The Sauerback line was one of the first noble houses to arrive in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. For millennia, we have served the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} and kept the faith. Sauerback warriors have bled in a hundred wars and at different times have ruled a great many colonies of the von Valancius dynasty."
languages.original_text: {n}Приосанившись, Махарий горделиво произносит:{/n} "Род Зауэрбэков — один из первых аристократических домов, прибывших в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простор Коронус{/g}. На протяжении тысячелетий мы верно служили {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотому Трону{/g} и хранили веру. Воины Зауэрбэков проливали кровь на сотне войн и в разные годы правили множеством колоний династии фон Валанциус".

For millennia, we have served the Golden Throne and kept the faith. Sauerback warriors bled in a hundred wars and at different times ruled a great many colonies of the von Valancius dynasty."

Sauerback warriors have bled in a hundred wars and at different times have ruled a great many colonies of the von Valancius dynasty."

languages.text: {n}マハリウスは胸を張って自信満々に語る。{/n}「ザウアーバックの血筋は{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}に最初に到着した貴族家のひとつです。数百年にわたって我らは{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}に仕え、忠誠を誓ってきました。ザウアーバック家の戦士は百の戦で血を流すとともに、さまざまな時代においてフォン・ヴァランシウス朝が有するコロニーを実に数多く統治してきました」
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius puffs out his chest and says proudly,{/n} "The Sauerback line was one of the first noble houses to arrive in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. For millennia, we have served the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} and kept the faith. Sauerback warriors have bled in a hundred wars and at different times have ruled a great many colonies of the von Valancius dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}マハリウスは胸を張って自信満々に語る。{/n}「ザウアーバックの血筋は{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}に最初に到着した貴族家のひとつです。数百年にわたって我らは{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}に仕え、忠誠を誓ってきました。ザウアーバック家の戦士は百の戦で血を流すとともに、さまざまな時代においてフォン・ヴァランシウス朝が有するコロニーを実に数多く統治してきました」

languages.text: {n}马卡里乌斯挺起胸膛，骄傲地开了口。{/n}“苏尔贝克家族是最早来到{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的贵族家族之一。千百年来，我们为{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}效力，坚守信仰。苏尔贝克的战士们在数百场战争中浴血奋战，在各个时期都掌管着冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的众多殖民地。”
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius puffs out his chest and says proudly,{/n} "The Sauerback line was one of the first noble houses to arrive in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. For millennia, we have served the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} and kept the faith. Sauerback warriors have bled in a hundred wars and at different times have ruled a great many colonies of the von Valancius dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}马卡里乌斯挺起胸膛，骄傲地开了口。{/n}“苏尔贝克家族是最早来到{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的贵族家族之一。千百年来，我们为{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}效力，坚守信仰。苏尔贝克的战士们在数百场战争中浴血奋战，在各个时期都掌管着冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的众多殖民地。”

languages.text: {n}Macharius saca pecho y dice orgulloso:{/n} «La estirpe de los Sauerback fue una de las primeras casas nobles en llegar a la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}. Durante milenios hemos servido al {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g} y mantenido la fe. Los guerreros de los Sauerback han derramado su sangre en un centenar de guerras y, en distintas épocas, hemos mandado en un sinfín de colonias de la dinastía von Valancius».
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius puffs out his chest and says proudly,{/n} "The Sauerback line was one of the first noble houses to arrive in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. For millennia, we have served the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} and kept the faith. Sauerback warriors have bled in a hundred wars and at different times have ruled a great many colonies of the von Valancius dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius saca pecho y dice orgulloso:{/n} «La estirpe de los Sauerback fue una de las primeras casas nobles en llegar a la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}. Durante milenios hemos servido al {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g} y mantenido la fe. Los guerreros de los Sauerback han derramado su sangre en un centenar de guerras y, en distintas épocas, hemos mandado en un sinfín de colonias de la dinastía von Valancius».

languages.text: {n}Macharius bombe fièrement le torse.{/n} « La lignée des Sauerback est l'une des premières à être arrivée dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. Des millénaires durant, nous avons servi le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g} et préservé la foi. Le sang de nos guerriers a été versé sur de nombreux champs de bataille au fil des années, et les nôtres ont plus d'une fois dirigé et fait prospérer des colonies de la dynastie von Valancius. »
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius puffs out his chest and says proudly,{/n} "The Sauerback line was one of the first noble houses to arrive in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. For millennia, we have served the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} and kept the faith. Sauerback warriors have bled in a hundred wars and at different times have ruled a great many colonies of the von Valancius dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius bombe fièrement le torse.{/n} « La lignée des Sauerback est l'une des premières à être arrivée dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. Des millénaires durant, nous avons servi le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g} et préservé la foi. Le sang de nos guerriers a été versé sur de nombreux champs de bataille au fil des années, et les nôtres ont plus d'une fois dirigé et fait prospérer des colonies de la dynastie von Valancius. »

languages.text: {n}Macharius antwortet mit stolzgeschwellter Brust:{/n} "Die Sauerback-Linie war eines der ersten Adelshäuser, das in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} eingetroffen ist. Seit Jahrtausenden dienen wir dem {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Thron{/g} und bewahren den Glauben. Sauerback-Kämpfer haben in Hunderten von Kriegen ihr Blut geopfert und immer wieder zahlreiche Kolonien der Dynastie von Valancius befehligt."
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius puffs out his chest and says proudly,{/n} "The Sauerback line was one of the first noble houses to arrive in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. For millennia, we have served the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} and kept the faith. Sauerback warriors have bled in a hundred wars and at different times have ruled a great many colonies of the von Valancius dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius antwortet mit stolzgeschwellter Brust:{/n} "Die Sauerback-Linie war eines der ersten Adelshäuser, das in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} eingetroffen ist. Seit Jahrtausenden dienen wir dem {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Thron{/g} und bewahren den Glauben. Sauerback-Kämpfer haben in Hunderten von Kriegen ihr Blut geopfert und immer wieder zahlreiche Kolonien der Dynastie von Valancius befehligt."

languages.text: {n}Macharius, göğsünü kabartarak gururla lafa giriyor.{/n} "Sauerback soyu, {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'ne{/g} varan ilk soylu hanelerdendi. Binlerce yıldır {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht'a{/g} hizmet edip imanımızı koruduk. Sauerback savaşçıları, yüzlerce savaşta kan döküp farklı dönemlerde von Valancius hanedanlığının nice ulu kolonisini yönetmiştir."
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius puffs out his chest and says proudly,{/n} "The Sauerback line was one of the first noble houses to arrive in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. For millennia, we have served the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} and kept the faith. Sauerback warriors have bled in a hundred wars and at different times have ruled a great many colonies of the von Valancius dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius, göğsünü kabartarak gururla lafa giriyor.{/n} "Sauerback soyu, {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'ne varan ilk soylu hanelerdendi. Binlerce yıldır {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht{/g}'a hizmet edip imanımızı koruduk. Sauerback savaşçıları yüzlerce savaşta kan döktü ve farklı dönemlerde von Valancius hanedanlığının nice ulu kolonisini yönetti."
